title: Ep. 103 - My Conversation with One of the Best Traders
itunes:title: My Conversation with One of the Best Traders
description: Jeff Clark, editor of the S&A Short Report newsletter, tells us why traders should ignore the 200-day moving average… And focus on this instead. Frank breaks down big oil’s profits - as not everything is as good as it seems.
content:encoded: Jeff Clark, editor of the S&A Short Report newsletter, tells us why traders should ignore the 200-day moving average… And focus on this instead. Frank breaks down big oil’s profits - as not everything is as good as it seems.
